name: BanzaiMuskrat
author: BanzaiMuskrat
notes: Aliens are legit. Really fun and powerful deck. Many ways to build it but I chose backrow to help with glad beasts and hazy. Restart to maximize chance of opening recombination device, the main engine of the deck. Can get some nice OTKs with triangle or Econ. Sadly loses to stall decks that donâ€™t summon monsters. Might lose power as people learn how to play around it.
